languages.text: "Послушание будет вознаграждено. Забери свою примитивную экипировку. Исходящая от нее технологическая банальность вызывает у меня отвращение, но столь неразвитому существу, как ты, она будет в самый раз". {n}Тервантьяс щелкает незримым суставом в руке.{/n} "Когда закончишь с этим, ступай и взгляни на тех, от чьего клинка ты, скорее всего, умрешь, когда тому придет время".

"Obedience will be rewarded. Take your crude gear with you. I abhor such technological banality, but a creature as undeveloped as you may find it of use." {n}You hear one of the joints in Tervantias's arm click.{/n} "Once you are finished with this, go and look at the ones who will be your executioners when the time comes for you to die."
languages.original_text: "Послушание будет вознаграждено. Забери свою примитивную экипировку. traits.locale_text: "Obedience will be rewarded. Take your crude gear with you. I abhor such technological banality, but a creature as undeveloped as you may find it of use." {n}You hear one of the joints in Tervantias's arm click.{/n} "As for your task... Aebys and his Bloodstained Proselytes are here right now, in my Anatomical Opera. Go and look at the ones who will be your executioners when the time comes for you to die."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

I abhor such technological banality, but a creature as undeveloped as you may find it of use." {n}You hear one of the joints in Tervantias's arm click.{/n} "Once you are finished with this, go and look at the ones who will be your executioners when the time comes for you to die."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: « Votre obéissance sera récompensée. Emportez votre matériel si rudimentaire avec vous. J'exècre les technologies d'une telle banalité, mais j'imagine qu'une créature aussi primaire que vous devrait lui trouver quelque utilité. » {n}Vous entendez les articulations du bras de Tervantias craquer.{/n} « Une fois que vous en aurez terminé, allez donc voir ceux qui seront vos bourreaux quand l'heure sera venue pour vous de mourir. »
languages.original_text: "Obedience will be rewarded. Take your crude gear with you. I abhor such technological banality, but a creature as undeveloped as you may find it of use." {n}You hear one of the joints in Tervantias's arm click.{/n} "Once you are finished with this, go and look at the ones who will be your executioners when the time comes for you to die."

traits.locale_text: « Votre obéissance sera récompensée. Emportez votre matériel si rudimentaire avec vous. J'exècre les technologies d'une telle banalité, mais j'imagine qu'une créature aussi primaire que vous devrait lui trouver quelque utilité. » {n}Vous entendez les articulations du bras de Tervantias craquer.{/n} « Une fois que vous en aurez terminé, allez donc voir ceux qui seront vos bourreaux quand l'heure sera venue pour vous de mourir. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: “只要服从，就会得到回报。带走你那堆破烂玩意儿吧，我厌恶这些平庸的技术造物，不过像你这种原始的生物或许会需要它们。”{n}你听到特万提亚斯某条手臂的关节发出了“咔”的一声。{/n}“等你把事情办完，做好赴死的准备之后，你可以去看看你会死在什么人手上。”
languages.original_text: "Obedience will be rewarded. Take your crude gear with you. I abhor such technological banality, but a creature as undeveloped as you may find it of use." {n}You hear one of the joints in Tervantias's arm click.{/n} "Once you are finished with this, go and look at the ones who will be your executioners when the time comes for you to die."

traits.locale_text: “只要服从，就会得到回报。带走你那堆破烂玩意儿吧，我厌恶这些平庸的技术造物，不过像你这种愚蠢的生物或许会需要它们。”{n}你听到特万提亚斯某条手臂的关节发出了“咔”的一声。{/n}“至于你的任务……阿贝斯和他手下的血腥叛党就在这里，在我这座解剖歌剧院里。等你准备赴死好的时候，可以去看看你会死在什么人手上。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Gehorsam wird belohnt. Nehmt Eure krude Ausrüstung mit. Ich verabscheue derlei technologische Banalität, aber eine unterentwickelte Kreatur wie Ihr es seid, findet gewiss Verwendung dafür." {n}Du hörst eines der Gelenke in Tervantias' Arm klicken.{/n} "Wenn Ihr hiermit fertig seid, geht und betrachtet jene, die Eure Henker sein werden, wenn die Stunde Eures Todes gekommen ist."
languages.original_text: "Obedience will be rewarded. Take your crude gear with you. I abhor such technological banality, but a creature as undeveloped as you may find it of use." {n}You hear one of the joints in Tervantias's arm click.{/n} "Once you are finished with this, go and look at the ones who will be your executioners when the time comes for you to die."

traits.locale_text: "Eine letzte Sache noch. Nehmt Eure krude Ausrüstung mit. Ich verabscheue derlei technologische Banalität."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: «La obediencia tiene su recompensa. Llévate tu rudimentario equipo. Aborrezco estas banalidades tecnológicas, pero un ser subdesarrollado como tú podría darles uso». {n}Oyes un chasquido de una de las articulaciones del brazo de Tervantias.{/n} «Cuando termines con esto, ve a ver a quienes serán tus verdugos cuando llegue la hora de tu muerte».
languages.original_text: "Obedience will be rewarded. Take your crude gear with you. I abhor such technological banality, but a creature as undeveloped as you may find it of use." {n}You hear one of the joints in Tervantias's arm click.{/n} "Once you are finished with this, go and look at the ones who will be your executioners when the time comes for you to die."

traits.locale_text: «La obediencia tiene su recompensa. Llévate tu rudimentario equipo. Aborrezco estas banalidades tecnológicas, pero un ser subdesarrollado como tú podría darles uso». {n}Oyes un chasquido de una de las articulaciones del brazo de Tervantias.{/n} «En cuanto a tu misión... Aebys y sus Prosélitos Ensangrentados están aquí, en mi Ópera Anatómica, en este momento. Ve a ver a quienes serán tus verdugos cuando llegue la hora de tu muerte».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: 「服従には報いがあるものだ。その粗末な道具はお前が持っていくがいい。そのような陳腐な技術は私の忌み嫌うところではあるが、お前たちのような未発達の生物には役に立つかもしれないだろう」{n}テルヴァンティアスの腕の関節がカチリという音を立てる。{/n}「これが終わり、お前が死ぬ時が来たら、処刑人となる者たちを見に行くがいい」
languages.original_text: "Obedience will be rewarded. Take your crude gear with you. I abhor such technological banality, but a creature as undeveloped as you may find it of use." {n}You hear one of the joints in Tervantias's arm click.{/n} "Once you are finished with this, go and look at the ones who will be your executioners when the time comes for you to die."

traits.locale_text: 「服従には報いがあるものだ。その粗末な道具はお前が持っていくがいい。そのような陳腐な技術は私の忌み嫌うところではあるが、お前たちのような未発達の生物には役に立つかもしれないだろう」{n}テルヴァンティアスの腕の関節がカチリという音を立てる。{/n}「これが終わり、お前が死ぬ時が来たら、処刑人となる者たちを見に行くがいい」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "İtaatin ödüllendirilecek. İlkel teçhizatını yanına alabilirsin. Bu tip banal teknolojilerden tiksinsem de senin gibi az gelişmiş bir yaratığın işine yarayabilirler." {n}Tervantias'ın kolundaki eklemlerden birinin çıtladığını duyuyorsun.{/n} "Bununla işini bitir, sonra da ölme zamanın geldiğinde seni infaz edecekleri gör."
languages.original_text: "Obedience will be rewarded. Take your crude gear with you. I abhor such technological banality, but a creature as undeveloped as you may find it of use." {n}You hear one of the joints in Tervantias's arm click.{/n} "Once you are finished with this, go and look at the ones who will be your executioners when the time comes for you to die."

traits.locale_text: "İtaatin ödüllendirilecek. İlkel teçhizatını yanına alabilirsin. Bu tip banal teknolojilerden tiksinirim ancak senin gibi az gelişmiş bir yaratığın işine yarayabilirler." {n}Tervantias'ın kolundaki eklemlerden birinin çıtladığını duyuyorsun.{/n} "Bununla işin bittikten sonra, ölme zamanın geldiğinde infazcıların olacak kişilere gidip bak."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
